name: Rio 500 tui
short_description: rio500_tui is a text user interface to your Diamond Rio 500.  It provides a file manager style interface to the lib rio500 available at http://rio500.sf.net.  It is written in Perl using the cpan module Term::Clui.  It is quick and easy to use and unders
